title: Avogadro's Number
text: The concept of the mole can be used to convert between Mass and number of particles.

title: Avogadro's Number
text: One mole of a substance is equal to $$6.022\times {10}^{23}$$ units of that substance. That quantity is known as Avogardo's number.

title: Balancing Equations
text: The balanced equation shows that carbon dioxide is produced from propane in a 3:1 ratio:\n##figure2.gif##
